definitions.title: n.pr.m.
definitions.body: (Bêl-šar-uṣur, Bel, protect the king COT Da 5:1) Da 8:1; represented as king of Babylon, successor, and appar. son of Nebuchadrezzar (Da 5:1, Da 5:2, Da 5:11 etc.); in cuneif. inscr. known only as prince, son of Nabonidus (last Shemitic king of Babylon), v. COT l. c.
